mapper.select: select a.out_dept_id as outDeptId, max(a.out_dept_name) as outDeptName, count(0) as peopleNum, sum(a.total_cost) as totalCost, sum(b.settle_take_price) as settleTakePriceAll, sum(b.settle_back_price) as settleBackPriceAll from inpt_visit a left join inpt_settle b on a.id = b.visit_id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.status_code = #{statusCode} group by a.out_dept_id

select a.order_no as orderNo, count(0) as detailNum, count(distinct a.item_id) as itemNum, count(distinct a.batch_no) as batchNoNum, sum(a.num * a.buy_price) as buyPriceAll, sum(a.num * a.sell_price) as sellPriceAll, sum(a.num * a.buy_price)/count(distinct a.item_id) as avgItemBuyPrice, (sum(a.num * a.sell_price)-sum(a.num * a.buy_price)) as priceSpread, max(a.id) as supplierName from stro_invoicing a where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.outin_code = '8' and biz_id in
#{item}
and a.crte_time >=STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and a.crte_time <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
group by a.order_no

select count(0) as detailNum, count(distinct a.item_id) as itemNum, count(distinct a.batch_no) as batchNoNum, sum(a.num * a.buy_price) as buyPriceAll, sum(a.num * a.sell_price) as sellPriceAll, sum(a.num * a.buy_price)/count(distinct a.item_id) as avgItemBuyPrice, case max(a.item_code) when '1' then (select p.name from base_finance_classify p where p.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and p.code = max(b.bfc_code)) when '2' then (select p.name from base_finance_classify p where p.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and p.code = max(c.bfc_code)) end bfcName, (sum(a.num * a.sell_price) - sum(a.num * a.buy_price)) as priceSpread, max(a.id) as supplierName from stro_invoicing a left join base_drug b on a.item_id = b.id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and a.item_code = '1' left join base_material c on a.item_id = c.id and a.hosp_code = c.hosp_code and a.item_code = '2' where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.outin_code = '8' and biz_id in
#{item}
and a.crte_time >=STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and a.crte_time <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
group by (case a.item_code when '1' then b.bfc_code when '2' then c.bfc_code end)

SELECT t.bfc_id, (select y.`name` from base_finance_classify y where y.hosp_code = t.hosp_code and y.id = t.bfc_id) bfc_name, sum(reality_price) reality_price FROM inpt_cost t WHERE date(t.cost_time) >= date(#{startDate}) and date(t.cost_time) <= date(#{endDate}) and t.hosp_code = #{hospCode} group by t.hosp_code,t.bfc_id

SELECT t.bfc_id, (select y.`name` from base_finance_classify y where y.hosp_code = t.hosp_code and y.id = t.bfc_id) bfc_name, sum(reality_price) reality_price FROM inpt_cost t WHERE date(t.cost_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(#{startDate},INTERVAL 1 year), '%Y-%m-%d') and date(t.cost_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(#{endDate},INTERVAL 1 year),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') and t.hosp_code = #{hospCode} group by t.hosp_code,t.bfc_id

SELECT t.bfc_id, (select y.`name` from base_finance_classify y where y.hosp_code = t.hosp_code and y.id = t.bfc_id) bfc_name, sum(reality_price) reality_price FROM inpt_cost t WHERE date(t.cost_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(#{startDate},INTERVAL 1 month), '%Y-%m-%d') and date(t.cost_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(#{endDate},INTERVAL 1 month),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') and t.hosp_code = #{hospCode} group by t.hosp_code,t.bfc_id

SELECT t.bfc_id, (select y.`name` from base_finance_classify y where y.hosp_code = t.hosp_code and y.id = t.bfc_id) bfc_name, sum(reality_price) reality_price FROM outpt_cost t WHERE date(t.cost_time) >= DATE_FORMAT( #{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) and date(t.cost_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{endDate},INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') and t.hosp_code = #{hospCode} group by t.hosp_code,t.bfc_id

SELECT t.bfc_id, (select y.`name` from base_finance_classify y where y.hosp_code = t.hosp_code and y.id = t.bfc_id) bfc_name, sum(reality_price) reality_price FROM outpt_cost t WHERE date(t.cost_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(#{startDate},INTERVAL 1 year), '%Y-%m-%d') and date(t.cost_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(#{endDate},INTERVAL 1 year),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') and t.hosp_code = #{hospCode} group by t.hosp_code,t.bfc_id

SELECT t.bfc_id, (select y.`name` from base_finance_classify y where y.hosp_code = t.hosp_code and y.id = t.bfc_id) bfc_name, sum(reality_price) reality_price FROM outpt_cost t WHERE date(t.cost_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(#{startDate},INTERVAL 1 month), '%Y-%m-%d') and date(t.cost_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(#{endDate},INTERVAL 1 month),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') and t.hosp_code = #{hospCode} group by t.hosp_code,t.bfc_id

select * from (
select ifnull(B.reality_price,0) as realityPrice, ifnull(B.bfc_id,'0') as bfcId, ifnull((select name from base_finance_classify bfc where bfc.id = B.bfc_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as bfcName, ifnull(B.doctor_id,'0') as doctorId, ifnull(B.doctor_name,t.doctor_name) as doctorName,
ifnull((select id from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bd.code = (select dept_code from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and su.id = B.doctor_id )),'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bd.code = (select dept_code from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and su.id = B.doctor_id )),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(B.dept_id,'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bfc where bfc.id = B.dept_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(A.crte_name,'其他') as chargeName, ifnull(A.crte_id,'0') as chargeId,
ifnull(B.visit_id,'0') as visitId, t.name as visitName from outpt_settle A left join outpt_cost B on A.id = B.settle_id and A.hosp_code = B.hosp_code left join outpt_visit t on t.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and t.id = B.visit_id where A.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and A.is_settle = '1' and b.settle_code = '2'
and A.settle_time >=STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
/*结束日期*/
and A.settle_time <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
union all
select ifnull(B.reality_price,0) as realityPrice, ifnull(B.bfc_id,'0') as bfcId, ifnull((select name from base_finance_classify bfc where bfc.id = B.bfc_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as bfcName, ifnull(t.doctor_id,'0') as doctorId, ifnull(C.doctor_name,t.doctor_name) as doctorName,
ifnull((select id from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bd.code = (select dept_code from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and su.id = c.doctor_id )),'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bd.code = (select dept_code from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and su.id = c.doctor_id )),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(c.dept_id,'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bfc where bfc.id = c.dept_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(A.crte_name,'其他') as chargeName, ifnull(A.crte_id,'0') as chargeId,
ifnull(B.visit_id,'0') as visitId, t.name as visitName from outpt_register_settle A left join outpt_register_detail B on A.register_id = B.register_id and A.hosp_code = B.hosp_code and A.status_code = B.status_code left join outpt_register C on A.register_id = C.id and A.hosp_code = C.hosp_code left join outpt_visit t on t.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and t.id = B.visit_id where A.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and A.status_code = '0' and B.status_code = '0'
and A.settle_time >=STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
/*结束日期*/
and A.settle_time <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
union all
select ifnull(ics.reality_price, ifnull(B.reality_price, 0)) as realityPrice, ifnull(B.bfc_id,'0') as bfcId, ifnull((select name from base_finance_classify bfc where bfc.id = B.bfc_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as bfcName,
ifnull(B.zg_doctor_id,'0') as doctorId, ifnull(B.zg_doctor_name,t.zz_doctor_name) as doctorName,
ifnull(B.doctor_id,'0') as doctorId, ifnull(B.doctor_name,t.zz_doctor_name) as doctorName,
ifnull(B.jz_doctor_id,'0') as doctorId, ifnull(B.jz_doctor_name,t.zz_doctor_name) as doctorName,
ifnull(B.zz_doctor_id,'0') as doctorId, ifnull(B.zz_doctor_name,t.zz_doctor_name) as doctorName,
ifnull((select id from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bd.code = (select dept_code from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and su.id = B.doctor_id )),'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bd.code = (select dept_code from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and su.id = B.doctor_id )),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(B.in_dept_id,'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bfc where bfc.id = B.in_dept_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(B.exec_dept_id,'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bfc where bfc.id = B.exec_dept_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(B.dept_id,'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bfc where bfc.id = B.dept_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(B.dept_id,'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bfc where bfc.id = B.dept_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(A.crte_name,'其他') as chargeName, ifnull(A.crte_id,'0') as chargeId,
ifnull(B.visit_id,'0') as visitId, t.name as visitName from
inpt_cost B inner join inpt_visit t on t.hosp_code = B.hosp_code and B.visit_id = t.id left join inpt_cost_settle ics on ics.hosp_code = t.hosp_code and ics.cost_id = B.id where B.hosp_code = #{hospCode}
and B.cost_time >=STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
/*结束日期*/
and B.cost_time <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
inpt_settle A inner join inpt_cost B on A.id = B.settle_id and A.hosp_code = B.hosp_code inner join inpt_cost_settle ics on B.id=ics.cost_id inner join inpt_visit t on t.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and t.id = B.visit_id where A.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and A.is_settle = '1' and B.settle_code = '2' and A.status_code = '0'
and A.settle_time >=STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
/*结束日期*/
and A.settle_time <=STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
) tab
tab.deptName like concat('%',#{doctorName},'%') or tab.doctorName like concat('%',#{doctorName},'%')

select * from (
select ifnull(B.reality_price,0) as realityPrice, ifnull(B.bfc_id,'0') as bfcId, ifnull((select name from base_finance_classify bfc where bfc.id = B.bfc_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as bfcName, ifnull(B.doctor_id,'0') as doctorId, ifnull(B.doctor_name,t.doctor_name) as doctorName,
ifnull((select id from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bd.code = (select dept_code from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and su.id = B.doctor_id )),'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bd.code = (select dept_code from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and su.id = B.doctor_id )),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(B.dept_id,'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bfc where bfc.id = B.dept_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(B.visit_id,'0') as visitId, t.name as visitName from outpt_settle A inner join outpt_cost B on A.id = B.settle_id and A.hosp_code = B.hosp_code inner join outpt_visit t on t.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and t.id = B.visit_id where A.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and A.is_settle = '1' and b.settle_code = '2'
and date(A.settle_time) >=date(#{startDate})
/*结束日期*/
and date(A.settle_time) <= date(#{endDate})
union all
select ifnull(B.reality_price,0) as realityPrice, ifnull(B.bfc_id,'0') as bfcId, ifnull((select name from base_finance_classify bfc where bfc.id = B.bfc_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as bfcName, ifnull(C.doctor_id,'0') as doctorId, ifnull(C.doctor_name,t.doctor_name) as doctorName,
ifnull((select id from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bd.code = (select dept_code from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and su.id = c.doctor_id )),'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bd.code = (select dept_code from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and su.id = c.doctor_id )),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(c.dept_id,'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bfc where bfc.id = c.dept_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(B.visit_id,'0') as visitId, t.name as visitName from outpt_register_settle A inner join outpt_register_detail B on A.register_id = B.register_id and A.hosp_code = B.hosp_code and A.status_code = B.status_code inner join outpt_register C on A.register_id = C.id and A.hosp_code = C.hosp_code inner join outpt_visit t on t.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and t.id = B.visit_id where A.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and A.status_code = '0' and B.status_code = '0'
and date(A.settle_time) >=date(#{startDate})
/*结束日期*/
and date(A.settle_time) <= date(#{endDate})
union all
select ifnull(ics.reality_price,0) as realityPrice, ifnull(B.bfc_id,'0') as bfcId, ifnull((select name from base_finance_classify bfc where bfc.id = B.bfc_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as bfcName,
ifnull(B.zg_doctor_id,'0') as doctorId, ifnull(B.zg_doctor_name,t.zz_doctor_name) as doctorName,
ifnull(B.doctor_id,'0') as doctorId, ifnull(B.doctor_name,t.zz_doctor_name) as doctorName,
ifnull((select id from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bd.code = (select dept_code from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and su.id = B.doctor_id )),'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bd where bd.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bd.code = (select dept_code from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and su.id = B.doctor_id )),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(B.in_dept_id,'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bfc where bfc.id = B.in_dept_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(B.exec_dept_id,'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bfc where bfc.id = B.exec_dept_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(B.dept_id,'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bfc where bfc.id = B.dept_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(B.visit_id,'0') as visitId, t.name as visitName from inpt_settle A inner join inpt_cost B on A.id = B.settle_id and A.hosp_code = B.hosp_code inner join inpt_cost_settle ics on B.id=ics.cost_id inner join inpt_visit t on t.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and t.id = B.visit_id where A.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and A.is_settle = '1' and B.settle_code = '2' and A.status_code = '0'
and date(B.cost_time) >=date(#{startDate})
/*结束日期*/
and date(B.cost_time) <= date(#{endDate})
and date(A.settle_time) >=date(#{startDate})
/*结束日期*/
and date(A.settle_time) <=date(#{endDate})
) tab
tab.deptName like concat('%',#{doctorName},'%') or tab.doctorName like concat('%',#{doctorName},'%')

select a.bfc_id, a.item_name, a.spec, a.num_unit_code as unit_name, max(a.price) as price, sum(a.total_num) as total_num, sum(a.total_price) as total_price, max(a.preferential_price) as preferential_price, sum(a.reality_price) as reality_price from outpt_settle settle join outpt_cost a on settle.id = a.settle_id and a.hosp_code = settle.hosp_code join outpt_visit visit on visit.id = settle.visit_id where settle.is_settle = '1' and a.hosp_code = #{hospCode}
and DATE_FORMAT(settle.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(settle.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and visit.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and a.status_code = #{statusCode}
group by a.bfc_id,a.item_name,a.spec,a.num_unit_code union all select a.bfc_id, a.item_name, ifnull(a.spec,'') as spec, a.unit_code as unit_name, max(a.price) as price, sum(a.num) as total_num, sum(a.total_price) as total_price, max(a.preferential_price) as preferential_price, sum(a.reality_price) as reality_price from outpt_register_settle settle join outpt_register_detail a on settle.register_id = a.register_id and a.hosp_code = settle.hosp_code and settle.status_code = a.status_code join outpt_visit visit on visit.id = a.visit_id where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode}
and DATE_FORMAT(settle.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(settle.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and visit.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and a.status_code = #{statusCode}
group by a.bfc_id,a.item_name,a.spec,a.unit_code

select a.item_name, a.num_unit_code as unit_name, a.spec, max(a.price) as price, sum(a.total_num) as total_num, sum(a.total_price) as total_price, max(a.preferential_price) as preferential_price, sum(a.reality_price) as reality_price from outpt_settle settle join outpt_cost a on settle.id = a.settle_id and a.hosp_code = settle.hosp_code join outpt_visit visit on visit.id = settle.visit_id where settle.is_settle = '1' and a.hosp_code = #{hospCode}
and DATE_FORMAT(settle.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(settle.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and visit.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and a.status_code = #{statusCode}
group by a.item_name, a.spec,a.num_unit_code union all select a.item_name, a.unit_code as unit_name, a.spec, max(a.price) as price, sum(a.num) as total_num, sum(a.total_price) as total_price, max(a.preferential_price) as preferential_price, sum(a.reality_price) as reality_price from outpt_register_settle settle join outpt_register_detail a on settle.register_id = a.register_id and a.hosp_code = settle.hosp_code and settle.status_code = a.status_code join outpt_visit visit on visit.id = a.visit_id where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode}
and DATE_FORMAT(settle.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(settle.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and visit.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and a.status_code = #{statusCode}
group by a.item_name, a.spec,a.unit_code

select a.bfc_id, a.item_name, a.spec, a.num_unit_code as unit_name, max(a.price) as price, sum(a.total_num) as num, sum(a.total_price) as total_price, max(a.preferential_price) as preferential_price, sum(a.reality_price) as reality_price from inpt_settle settle join inpt_cost a on settle.id = a.settle_id and a.hosp_code = settle.hosp_code join inpt_visit b on a.visit_id = b.id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code where settle.is_settle = '1' and a.hosp_code = #{hospCode}

and b.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and a.status_code = #{statusCode}

where settle.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and ((date_format(settle.settle_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT( #{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) and date_format(settle.settle_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= date_format(ifnull(#{endDate}, now()), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) or date_format(settle.settle_time,'%Y-%m') = date_format(DATE_SUB(#{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') or (date_format(settle.settle_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(#{startDate}, interval 1 year), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) and date_format(settle.settle_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(ifnull(#{endDate}, now()), interval 1 year), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ))) group by b.up_code union all

select * from ( select a.bfc_id,a.hosp_code from outpt_cost a where a.status_code = '2' union select b.bfc_id,a.hosp_code from outpt_register_settle a join outpt_register_detail b on a.register_id = b.register_id and a.status_code = b.status_code union select a.bfc_id,a.hosp_code from inpt_cost a where a.status_code = '2' )a join base_finance_classify b on a.bfc_id = b.id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code

SELECT t1.settleTime, t2.totalPrice, t2.selfPrice, t2.miPrice, t2.apOffsetPrice, t1.XJprice, t1.POSprice, t1.ZPprice, t1.ZZprice, t1.WXprice, t1.ZFBprice, t2.truncPrice,t3.name,t3.crteName ${sql1} FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ss.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d') settleTime,ss.visit_id,ss.name, IFNULL(SUM(CASE ss.pay_code WHEN '1' THEN ss.price ELSE 0 END ),0) as XJprice, IFNULL(SUM(CASE ss.pay_code WHEN '2' THEN ss.price ELSE 0 END ),0) as POSprice, IFNULL(SUM(CASE ss.pay_code WHEN '3' THEN ss.price ELSE 0 END ),0) as ZPprice, IFNULL(SUM(CASE ss.pay_code WHEN '4' THEN ss.price ELSE 0 END ),0) as ZZprice, IFNULL(SUM(CASE ss.pay_code WHEN '5' THEN ss.price ELSE 0 END ),0) as WXprice, IFNULL(SUM(CASE ss.pay_code WHEN '6' THEN ss.price ELSE 0 END ),0) as ZFBprice FROM ( select 'MZ' sxtj, DATE_FORMAT(a.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as settle_time, reality_price, a.mi_price mi_price, b.pay_code, b.price, a.self_price, 0 ap_offset_price, a.visit_id,c.name from outpt_settle a left join outpt_pay b on a.id = b.settle_id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code left join outpt_visit c on a.visit_id = c.id and a.hosp_code = c.hosp_code where a.is_settle = '1'
and DATE(a.settle_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE(a.settle_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
UNION ALL select 'ZY' sxtj, DATE_FORMAT(a.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as settle_time, reality_price, a.mi_price mi_price, b.pay_code, b.price, a.self_price, a.ap_offset_price, a.visit_id,c.name from inpt_settle a left join inpt_pay b on a.id = b.settle_id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code left join inpt_visit c on a.visit_id = c.id and a.hosp_code = c.hosp_code where a.is_settle = '1'
and DATE(a.settle_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE(a.settle_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
UNION ALL select 'GH' sxtj, DATE_FORMAT(a.crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as settle_time, a.reality_price, null mi_price, b.pay_code, b.price, a.reality_price self_price, 0 ap_offset_price, c.visit_id,d.name from outpt_register_settle a join outpt_register_detail c on a.register_id = c.register_id and a.hosp_code = c.hosp_code and a.status_code = c.status_code left join outpt_register_pay b on c.visit_id = b.visit_id and c.hosp_code = b.hosp_code left join outpt_visit d on a.register_id = d.register_id and a.hosp_code = d.hosp_code where 1=1
and DATE(a.crte_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE(a.crte_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
) ss GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ss.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d'), ss.visit_id,ss.name ) t1 join ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ss.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d') settleTime, sum(reality_price) totalPrice, sum(mi_price) miPrice, sum(self_price) selfPrice, sum(ap_offset_price) apOffsetPrice, sum(trunc_price) truncPrice, ss.visit_id,ss.name FROM ( select 'MZ' sxtj, DATE_FORMAT(a.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as settle_time, reality_price, a.mi_price mi_price, a.self_price, 0 ap_offset_price, a.trunc_price, a.visit_id,b.name from outpt_settle a left join outpt_visit b on a.visit_id = b.id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code where a.is_settle = '1'
and DATE(a.settle_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE(a.settle_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
UNION ALL select 'ZY' sxtj, DATE_FORMAT(a.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as settle_time, reality_price, a.mi_price mi_price, a.self_price, a.ap_offset_price, a.trunc_price, a.visit_id,b.name from inpt_settle a left join inpt_visit b on a.visit_id = b.id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code where a.is_settle = '1'
and DATE(a.settle_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE(a.settle_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
UNION ALL select 'GH' sxtj, DATE_FORMAT(a.crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as settle_time, a.reality_price, null mi_price,a.reality_price self_price, 0 ap_offset_price, 0 trunc_price, c.visit_id,d.name from outpt_register_settle a join outpt_register_detail c on a.register_id = c.register_id and a.hosp_code = c.hosp_code and a.status_code = c.status_code left join outpt_visit d on a.register_id = d.register_id and a.hosp_code = d.hosp_code where 1=1
and DATE(a.crte_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE(a.crte_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
) ss GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ss.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d'), ss.visit_id,ss.name )t2 on t1.settleTime = t2.settleTime and t1.visit_id = t2.visit_id join ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ss.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d') settleTime, ss.visit_id,ss.name,ss.crte_name as crteName ${sql2} FROM ( select 'MZ' sxtj, DATE_FORMAT(a.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as settle_time, b.reality_price, a.crte_id, a.crte_name, b.bfc_id, a.hosp_code, a.visit_id,c.name from outpt_settle a join outpt_cost b on a.id = b.settle_id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code left join outpt_visit c on a.visit_id = c.id and a.hosp_code = c.hosp_code where a.is_settle = '1'
and DATE(a.settle_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE(a.settle_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
UNION ALL select 'ZY' sxtj, DATE_FORMAT(a.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as settle_time, ics.reality_price, a.crte_id, a.crte_name, b.bfc_id , a.hosp_code, a.visit_id,c.name from inpt_settle a join inpt_cost b on a.id = b.settle_id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code left join inpt_visit c on a.visit_id = c.id and a.hosp_code = c.hosp_code left join inpt_cost_settle ics on b.id=ics.cost_id where a.is_settle = '1'
and DATE(a.settle_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE(a.settle_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
UNION ALL select 'GH' sxtj, DATE_FORMAT(a.crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as settle_time, a.reality_price, a.crte_id, a.crte_name, b.bfc_id, a.hosp_code, b.visit_id,c.name from outpt_register_settle a join outpt_register_detail b on a.register_id = b.register_id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and a.status_code = c.status_code left join outpt_visit c on a.register_id = c.register_id and a.hosp_code = c.hosp_code where 1=1
and DATE(a.crte_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE(a.crte_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
) ss join base_finance_classify b on ss.bfc_id = b.id and ss.hosp_code = b.hosp_code GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ss.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d'), ss.visit_id,ss.name,ss.crte_name )t3 on t1.settleTime = t3.settleTime and t1.visit_id = t3.visit_id

SELECT id as item_id, IFNULL( usual_name, good_name ) AS item_name, code as itemCode, spec, price, unit_code as unitCode, split_ratio as splitRatio, split_unit_code as splitUnitCode FROM base_drug WHERE hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND is_valid = '1'
and (usual_pym like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or usual_wbm like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or good_pym like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or good_wbm like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or usual_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or good_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
UNION ALL SELECT id as item_id, name as item_name, code as itemCode, spec, price, unit_code as unitCode, split_ratio as splitRatio, split_unit_code as splitUnitCode FROM base_material WHERE hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND is_valid = '1'
and (pym like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or wbm like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
UNION ALL SELECT id as item_id, IFNULL( name, other_name ) AS item_name, code as itemCode, spec, price, unit_code as unitCode, '' as splitRatio, '' as splitUnitCode FROM base_item WHERE hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND is_valid = '1'
and (name_pym like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or name_wbm like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

select sum(t.totalPrice)+sum(t.chargeCardPrice)+sum(t.refundCardPrice) as totalPrice, sum(t.totalPrice) -IFNULL(sum(t.insureTotalPrice),0)-IFNULL(sum(t.cardPrice),0)-IFNULL(sum(t.truncPrice),0) as actualPrice, sum(t.selfPrice) as selfPrice, sum(t.insureTotalPrice) as insureTotalPrice, sum(t.truncPrice) as truncPrice, sum(t.cardPrice) as cardPrice, /**一卡通支付**/ max(t.crteName) as crteName, sum(t.chargeCardPrice) as chargeCardPrice, /**一卡通充值**/ sum(t.refundCardPrice) as refundCardPrice /**一卡通退费**/ from ( select a.reality_price as totalPrice, /**总费用**/ a.actual_price as actualPrice, /**实收金额**/ a.self_price as selfPrice, /**个人支付**/ a.card_price as cardPrice, /**一卡通支付**/ a.mi_price as insureTotalPrice, a.trunc_price as truncPrice, a.crte_name as crteName, a.crte_id as crteId, 0 as chargeCardPrice, 0 as refundCardPrice from outpt_settle a where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.is_settle = '1' /*开始日期*/
and DATE_FORMAT(a.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >=DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
/*结束日期*/
and DATE_FORMAT(a.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
union all
select a.reality_price as totalPrice, /**总费用**/ a.reality_price as actualPrice, /**实收金额**/ a.reality_price as selfPrice, /**个人支付**/ a.card_price as cardPrice, /**一卡通支付**/ 0 as insureTotalPrice, 0 as truncPrice, a.crte_name as crteName, a.crte_id as crteId, 0 as chargeCardPrice, 0 as refundCardPrice from outpt_register_settle a where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} /*开始日期*/
and DATE_FORMAT(a.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
/*结束日期*/
and DATE_FORMAT(a.settle_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
union all select 0 as totalPrice, /**总费用**/ 0 as actualPrice, /**实收金额**/ 0 as selfPrice, /**个人支付**/ 0 as cardPrice, /**一卡通支付**/ 0 as insureTotalPrice, 0 as truncPrice, a.crte_name as crteName, a.crte_id as crteId, if(a.status_code='6',a.price,0) as chargeCardPrice, if(a.status_code='7',a.price,0) as refundCardPrice from base_card_recharge_change a where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} /*开始日期*/
and DATE_FORMAT(a.crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >=DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
/*结束日期*/
and DATE_FORMAT(a.crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
) t group by t.crteId

select sum(c.totalPrice)+sum(c.chargeCardPrice)+sum(c.refundCardPrice) as totalPrice, /**应结费用**/ sum(c.backTotalPrice) AS backTotalPrice, (sum(c.totalPrice)-sum(c.backTotalPrice)-sum(c.insureTotalPrice)-sum(c.preferentialTotalPrice)-sum(c.truncPrice)-sum(c.cardPrice)) as actualPrice,/**实收金额**/ sum(c.insureTotalPrice) AS insureTotalPrice, /**合同单位支付金额**/ sum(c.preferentialTotalPrice) as preferentialTotalPrice, /**优惠金额**/ sum(c.truncPrice) as truncPrice, /**舍入金额**/ MAX(c.crteName) as crteName, sum(c.chargeCardPrice) as chargeCardPrice, sum(c.refundCardPrice) as refundCardPrice, sum(c.cardPrice) as cardPrice from (select 0 as totalPrice, 0 as backTotalPrice, 0 as actualPrice, 0 as insureTotalPrice, 0 as preferentialTotalPrice, 0 as truncPrice, a.crte_name as crteName, b.card_price as cardPrice, a.crte_id, 0 as chargeCardPrice, 0 as refundCardPrice from outin_daily a LEFT JOIN outpt_settle b on a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and a.id = b.daily_settle_id where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.type_code in ('1', '0') and b.card_price is not null and b.card_price !=''
and date(a.end_time) >=date(#{startDate})
and date(a.end_time) <= date(#{endDate})
union ALL select a.total_price as totalPrice, /**应结费用**/ a.back_total_price AS backTotalPrice, a.reality_total_price as actualPrice, /**实收金额**/ a.insure_total_price AS insureTotalPrice, /**合同单位支付金额**/ a.preferential_total_price as preferentialTotalPrice, /**优惠金额**/ a.round_total_price as truncPrice, /**舍入金额**/ a.crte_name as crteName, 0 as cardPrice, a.crte_id, 0 as chargeCardPrice, 0 as refundCardPrice from outin_daily a where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.type_code in ('1', '0')
and date(a.end_time) >=date(#{startDate})
and date(a.end_time) <= date(#{endDate})
UNION all select 0 as totalPrice, 0 as backTotalPrice, 0 as actualPrice, 0 as insureTotalPrice, 0 as preferentialTotalPrice, 0 as truncPrice, a.crte_name as crteName, d.card_price as cardPrice, a.crte_id, 0 as chargeCardPrice, 0 as refundCardPrice from outin_daily a LEFT JOIN outpt_register_settle d on a.id = d.daily_settle_id where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.type_code in ('1', '0') and d.card_price is not null and d.card_price !=''
and date(a.end_time) >=date(#{startDate})
and date(a.end_time) <= date(#{endDate})
union all select 0 as totalPrice, 0 as backTotalPrice, 0 as actualPrice, 0 as insureTotalPrice, 0 as preferentialTotalPrice, 0 as truncPrice, a.crte_name as crteName, 0 as cardPrice, a.crte_id, IF(d.status_code = '6',d.price,0) as chargeCardPrice, IF(d.status_code = '7',d.price,0) as refundCardPrice from outin_daily a LEFT JOIN base_card_recharge_change d on a.id = d.daily_settle_id where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.type_code in ('1', '0')
and date(a.end_time) >=date(#{startDate})
and date(a.end_time) <= date(#{endDate})
) c GROUP BY c.crte_id

select a.bfc_id,c.name as bfcName from outpt_cost a left join outpt_settle b on a.settle_id = b.id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and b.status_code = '0' join base_finance_classify c on a.bfc_id = c.id and a.hosp_code = c.hosp_code join outpt_visit d on a.visit_id = d.id and a.hosp_code = d.hosp_code where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} group by a.bfc_id,c.name

select b.up_code as upCode, c.name as bfcName from( /*======挂号的大类======begin*/ SELECT distinct a.bfc_id FROM outpt_register_settle settle JOIN outpt_register_detail a ON settle.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and settle.register_id = a.register_id AND settle.status_code = a.status_code WHERE settle.hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND ( ( settle.settle_time >= #{startDate} AND settle.settle_time <= ifnull( #{endDate}, now()) ) OR date_format( settle.settle_time, '%Y-%m' ) = date_format( DATE_SUB( #{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH ), '%Y-%m' ) OR ( settle.settle_time >= date_sub( #{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) AND settle.settle_time <= date_sub( ifnull( #{endDate}, now()), INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) ) ) /*======挂号的大类======end*/ union all /*=====门诊大类===begin*/ SELECT distinct a.bfc_id FROM outpt_settle settle JOIN outpt_cost a ON settle.id = a.settle_id AND settle.hosp_code = a.hosp_code AND a.settle_code = '2' WHERE settle.is_settle = '1' AND settle.hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND ( ( settle.settle_time >= #{startDate} AND settle.settle_time <= ifnull( #{endDate}, now()) ) OR date_format( settle.settle_time, '%Y-%m' ) = date_format( DATE_SUB( #{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH ), '%Y-%m' ) OR ( settle.settle_time >= date_sub( #{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) AND settle.settle_time <= date_sub( ifnull( #{endDate}, now()), INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) ) ) /*=====门诊大类===end*/ union all /*=====住院大类===begin*/ SELECT distinct a.bfc_id FROM inpt_settle settle JOIN inpt_cost a ON settle.id = ifnull( a.settle_id, '' ) AND settle.hosp_code = a.hosp_code AND a.settle_code = '2' WHERE settle.is_settle = '1' AND settle.hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND ( ( settle.settle_time >= #{startDate} AND settle.settle_time <= ifnull( #{endDate}, now()) ) OR date_format( settle.settle_time, '%Y-%m' ) = date_format( DATE_SUB( #{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH ), '%Y-%m' ) OR ( settle.settle_time >= date_sub( #{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) AND settle.settle_time <= date_sub( ifnull(#{endDate}, now()), INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) ) ) /*=====住院大类===end*/ )ab /*=====连base_finance_classify 获得名称===begin*/ JOIN base_finance_classify b ON ab.bfc_id = b.id and b.hosp_code = #{hospCode} JOIN base_finance_classify c ON b.up_code = c.code and c.hosp_code = #{hospCode} /*=====连base_finance_classify 获得名称===end*/ GROUP BY b.up_code, c.name

select b.id as bfcId, b.name as bfcName from( /*======挂号的大类======begin*/ SELECT distinct a.bfc_id FROM outpt_register_settle settle JOIN outpt_register_detail a ON settle.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and settle.register_id = a.register_id AND settle.status_code = a.status_code WHERE settle.hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND ( ( settle.settle_time >= #{startDate} AND settle.settle_time <= ifnull( #{endDate}, now()) ) OR date_format( settle.settle_time, '%Y-%m' ) = date_format( DATE_SUB( #{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH ), '%Y-%m' ) OR ( settle.settle_time >= date_sub( #{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) AND settle.settle_time <= date_sub( ifnull( #{endDate}, now()), INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) ) ) /*======挂号的大类======end*/ union all /*=====门诊大类===begin*/ SELECT distinct a.bfc_id FROM outpt_settle settle JOIN outpt_cost a ON settle.id = a.settle_id AND settle.hosp_code = a.hosp_code AND a.settle_code = '2' WHERE settle.is_settle = '1' AND settle.hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND ( ( settle.settle_time >= #{startDate} AND settle.settle_time <= ifnull( #{endDate}, now()) ) OR date_format( settle.settle_time, '%Y-%m' ) = date_format( DATE_SUB( #{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH ), '%Y-%m' ) OR ( settle.settle_time >= date_sub( #{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) AND settle.settle_time <= date_sub( ifnull( #{endDate}, now()), INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) ) ) /*=====门诊大类===end*/ union all /*=====住院大类===begin*/ SELECT distinct a.bfc_id FROM inpt_settle settle JOIN inpt_cost a ON settle.id = ifnull( a.settle_id, '' ) AND settle.hosp_code = a.hosp_code AND a.settle_code = '2' WHERE settle.is_settle = '1' AND settle.hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND ( ( settle.settle_time >= #{startDate} AND settle.settle_time <= ifnull( #{endDate}, now()) ) OR date_format( settle.settle_time, '%Y-%m' ) = date_format( DATE_SUB( #{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH ), '%Y-%m' ) OR ( settle.settle_time >= date_sub( #{startDate}, INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) AND settle.settle_time <= date_sub( ifnull(#{endDate}, now()), INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) ) ) /*=====住院大类===end*/ )ab /*=====连base_finance_classify 获得名称===begin*/ JOIN base_finance_classify b ON ab.bfc_id = b.id and b.hosp_code = #{hospCode} /*=====连base_finance_classify 获得名称===end*/ GROUP BY b.id, b.name

select * from (
select ifnull(B.reality_price,0) as realityPrice, ifnull(B.total_price,0) as totalPrice, ifnull(B.preferential_price,0) as preferentialPrice, ifnull(B.bfc_id,'0') as bfcId, ifnull((select name from base_finance_classify bfc where bfc.id = B.bfc_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as bfcName, ifnull(B.doctor_id,'0') as doctorId, ifnull(B.doctor_name,t.doctor_name) as doctorName,
ifnull(B.dept_id,'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bfc where bfc.id = B.dept_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(t.preferential_type_id,'0') as preferentialId, ifnull((select name from base_preferential_type bpt where bpt.id = t.preferential_type_id and bpt.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as preferentialName, ifnull((select name from base_dept bfc where bfc.id = B.dept_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(B.visit_id,'0') as visitId, t.name as visitName from outpt_settle A left join outpt_cost B on A.id = B.settle_id and A.hosp_code = B.hosp_code left join outpt_visit t on t.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and t.id = B.visit_id where A.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and A.is_settle = '1' and b.settle_code = '2'
and A.settle_time >=STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
/*结束日期*/
and A.settle_time <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
union all
select ifnull(B.reality_price,0) as realityPrice, ifnull(B.total_price,0) as totalPrice, ifnull(B.preferential_price,0) as preferentialPrice, ifnull(B.bfc_id,'0') as bfcId, ifnull((select name from base_finance_classify bfc where bfc.id = B.bfc_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as bfcName, ifnull(C.doctor_id,'0') as doctorId, ifnull(C.doctor_name,t.doctor_name) as doctorName,
ifnull(c.dept_id,'0') as deptId, ifnull((select name from base_dept bfc where bfc.id = c.dept_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(t.preferential_type_id,'0') as preferentialId, ifnull((select name from base_preferential_type bpt where bpt.id = t.preferential_type_id and bpt.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as preferentialName, ifnull((select name from base_dept bfc where bfc.id = c.dept_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as deptName,
ifnull(B.visit_id,'0') as visitId, t.name as visitName from outpt_register_settle A left join outpt_register_detail B on A.register_id = B.register_id and A.hosp_code = B.hosp_code and A.status_code = B.status_code left join outpt_register C on A.register_id = C.id and A.hosp_code = C.hosp_code left join outpt_visit t on t.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and t.id = B.visit_id where A.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and A.status_code = '0' and B.status_code = '0'
and A.settle_time >=STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
/*结束日期*/
and A.settle_time <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
) tab
tab.deptName like concat('%',#{doctorName},'%') or tab.doctorName like concat('%',#{doctorName},'%')

select ifnull(ics.reality_price, ifnull(B.reality_price, 0)) as realityPrice, ifnull(B.bfc_id,'0') as bfcId, ifnull((select name from base_finance_classify bfc where bfc.id = B.bfc_id and bfc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as bfcName, ifnull(B.visit_id,'0') as visitId, t.name as visitName, t.patient_code as patientCode, ifnull((select name from sys_code_detail sc where sc.`value` = t.patient_code and sc.c_code='BRLX' and sc.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ),'其他') as patientType from inpt_settle A inner join inpt_cost B on A.id = B.settle_id and A.hosp_code = B.hosp_code inner join inpt_cost_settle ics on B.id=ics.cost_id inner join inpt_visit t on t.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and t.id = B.visit_id where A.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and A.is_settle = '1' and B.settle_code = '2' and A.status_code = '0' /*开始日期*/
and A.settle_time >=STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
/*结束日期*/
and A.settle_time <=STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
